message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.NE 

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language) as it deals with natural language generation using deep learning techniques. It also involves text summarization and report generation, which are common topics in this sub-category. Additionally, cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning) are also likely sub-categories as the paper proposes a novel deep learning approach for generating macro research reports. cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is another possible sub-category as the paper involves crawling a large news-to-report dataset. Finally, cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) is a less likely sub-category as the paper uses neural networks for text generation.
